DASHBOARD.TITLE: Dashboard
DASHBOARD.AI_DESCRIPTION: Instantly create a detailed safety analysis based on your data.
DASHBOARD.AI_BASE_PROMPT: Generate a detailed HSE (Health, Safety, Environment) report based on the following request. The report must be comprehensive, professional, and in English. Include relevant safety recommendations and compliance guidelines.
DASHBOARD.PROMPT_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the situation, incident, or safety concern you want to analyze...
DASHBOARD.NO_REPORTS_FOUND: No reports found. Generate your first report to get started.

REPORT_GENERATOR.TITLE: AI Report Generator
REPORT_GENERATOR.PROMPT_PLACEHOLDER: Ex: Describe in detail the incident that occurred on assembly line B, including date, time, equipment involved and immediate actions taken...

RECENT_REPORTS.TITLE: Recent Reports
RECENT_REPORTS.EMPTY_STATE_TITLE: Your first report will appear here
RECENT_REPORTS.EMPTY_STATE_SUBTITLE: Use the AI generator to start your safety analysis.

NOTIFICATIONS.ERROR_LOADING_DATA: Could not load data. Please refresh the page.
NOTIFICATIONS.ERROR_GENERATING_REPORT: An error occurred while generating the report. Try again.
NOTIFICATIONS.ERROR_LIMIT_REACHED: You have reached your plan's report limit. Upgrade for unlimited access.

UPGRADE_BANNER.TEXT: You have used {{used}} of {{limit}} free reports.
UPGRADE_BANNER.CTA: Upgrade now for unlimited access and advanced features.

DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION_PLACEHOLDER: Describe the situation in detail, including location, date, people involved, circumstances, etc...
DASHBOARD.DESCRIPTION_TIP: Be specific to get a more accurate and detailed report.
DASHBOARD.NO_REPORTS_DESC: Generate your first report to see it here.
DASHBOARD.LIMIT_REACHED_DESC: You have reached the limit of 5 free reports this month. Upgrade to continue generating unlimited reports.
DASHBOARD.UPGRADE_MODAL_DESC: Upgrade to Premium plan and get unlimited access to AI report generation, advanced models and priority support.

PRICING.TITLE: Choose Your Plan
PRICING.SUBTITLE: Select the perfect plan for your HSE needs

SETUP.TITLE: Create your organization
SETUP.SUBTITLE: To get started, enter your organization details. You'll be able to invite your team next.
